Symbol Of Sleep (C5 Ench): R60' Rune sleeps 10 HD or less for 3d6x10 min (DC 16 Will neg) in 60' radius when triggered for 110 min
Symbol Of Stunning (C7 Ench): R60' Rune stuns for 1d6 rd (DC 18 Will neg) in 60' radius when triggered for 110 min
Symbol Of Weakness (C7 Necr): R60' Rune inflicts -3d6 Strength (DC 18 Fort neg) in 60' radius when triggered for 110 min
Tongues (C4 Divi): Touched communicate in any language for 110 min
True Resurrection (C9 Conj): Fully restores target dead up to 110 yr
True Seeing (C5 Divi): Touched sees through 120' darkness, illusion, and invisibility for 11 min
Undeath To Death (C6 Necr): R210' Destroys 11d4 HD of undead w/up to 8 HD in 40' radius (DC 17 Will neg)
Undetectable Alignment (C2 Abju): R50' Conceals target alignment for 1 dy (DC 13 Will neg)
Unhallow (C5 Grea): 40' radius from touched gives +2 AC and saves vs. good, suppresses mental control, bars contact by summoned good creatures, imposes -4 turn undead penalty, gives +4 rebuke undead bonus, and evokes bane spell
Unholy Aura (C8 Abju): 11 creatures in 20' radius gain +4 AC and saves and SR 25 (good), suppress mental control, and inflict -1d6 Strength on successful good attacker (DC 19 Fort neg) for 11 rd
Virtue (C0 Tran): Touched gains +1 temporary HP for 1 min
Wall Of Stone (C5 Conj): R210' Creates 11 5' x 2 inch thick permanent stone wall
Water Breathing (C3 Tran): Touched can breathe underwater for 22 hrs total
Water Walk (C3 Tran): 11 touched can walk on liquid as if it were a solid surface for 110 min
Wind Walk (C6 Tran): Self and 3 touched vaporize and move 60 MPH for 11 hr
Wind Wall (C3 Grea): R210' 110'x5' curtain of air scatters objects, deflects arrows and bolts for 11 rd
Word Of Chaos (C7 Evoc): Nonchaotic creatures in 40' radius with equal/-1/-5/-10 HD deafened for 1d4 rd/stunned for 1 rd/confused for 1d10 min/killed (DC 18 Will neg)
Word Of Recall (C6 Conj): Self and 3 willing targets return to designated place
Zone Of Truth (C2 Ench): R50' Creatures in 20' radius cannot lie for 11 min (DC 13 Will neg)
Magic Notes:
Spell Focus (Transmutation): +1 Spell DC (Transmutation)
Spellcasting (Transmutation): Learn 1 Channeler Transmutation spell; may learn more
Wisdom Legate Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level C1
Arcane Adept: Use magic device as W5
Arcane Spell Failure: 5%
Deadly Touch: Touch kills target w/up to 11d6 HP 1/dy
Spontaneous Legate Spell: Cast Inflict in place of known spell
Temple Dependency: Must participate at temple to receive spells
Companions
Animal Companion: Hawk "Goph"
Str: 6 (-2) Dex: 17 (+3) Con: 10 (+0) Int: 4 (-3) Wis: 14 (+2) Cha: 8 (-1) Size: T Tricks: 12
HD/HP: 5/22 Init: +3 AC: 17 Attack: +8 1d4-2 Fort/Ref/Will: +4/+7/+3
Animal Companion Features: Empathic Link; Enhanced Sense; Telepathy
Companion Notes:
Empathic Link: Share emotions w/in 1 mile
Enhanced Sense: +5 mile channeled event detection
Telepathy: R100' Companion-controlled telepathic communication
